website_summaries.verdict: Marvel fans should expect the best Hulk plush toy available to be nothing less than huge, and this one delivers with an incredibly soft and cuddly version of the jade giant.
pros: Bulky, yet sports a pillow-like texture
Designed after Hulk’s Avengers film appearances

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old grandson loves his Spider-Man pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this for my grandson for Christmas. He plays with too many toys that launch things. (ie guns etc). This granny worries about that. I did worry he wouldn’t be interested in a “doll” or “pillow”. But.... he loves it. And that makes me happy! It’s so soft, huggable and pliable he can do all kinds of things with it to play and sleep. PS. the mustaches are fake. Haha
customer_reviews.author: MsMel

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I gave Thor, Captain America, and the Hulk Pillowtime Pal as part of a group of 1st Birthday presents to my grandson ... a real son of Oden! He has had these by his side, underneath, over, and chewed on them for several months and loves them ... I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Oden

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: The structural quality of the plush seems fine, but there are many many loose threads in the detailing embroidery. The hands are particularly bad and I’m pretty sure I’ll have to replace the coat button at some point. The coat tails don’t appear to be hemmed. The fabric of the coat is not very soft or nice to cuddle. The seams all seem to be good however. Hopefully he’ll prove to be sturdy enough to stand up to long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Everything looks great except the tail feathers.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and material except the tail part. Tail feathers are made with paper. 2 are felt-like paper and other 5 are just paper to be exact. My daughter loves it but I’m sure the feathers will get torn apart pretty soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using Spiderman Doll As Potty Training Incentive - Poopin' 4 Spiderman Trick!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great doll! So soft and is very well constructed. I purchased this toy as an incentive for my 3 yr old grandson to potty-train (especially #2...lol he has a hang up about that for some reason). Anyway, I printed up some stickers on address adhesive label paper and will cut one Spiderman sticker out for each time he goes. Once all the stickers are gone he will receive the doll. Just hoping this will work and mom will no longer have the expense of pull-ups. The doll itself is large and makes a great gift. Sturdy enough for Spiderman pretend playing time adventures and doubles as a bedtime pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Millicent A Wycoff

customer_reviews.title: Not great for little kids
customer_reviews.text: The chicken it’s self is cute but The tail feathers are really disappointing. Material used is barely better than kids construction paper. Do NOT recommend
customer_reviews.author: C. Najera

customer_reviews.title: Great material, not-so-great durability
customer_reviews.text: I received the item last night, and for the majority of the time had been sitting in a chair. My child has played lightly with it, and in a matter of hours the seam has already come apart in an area where i assume it was assembled. We are pretty disappointed because, overall, the toy seems to look very durable. My child doesn't play very rough with her stuffed animals, typically just carries them around. Now we are having to repair it less than 24 hours into receiving it. The company who sold it does allow a refund, or return at no cost, so this is not a reflection of the supplier, just surprised that it fell apart so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: KeiriSato

customer_reviews.title: Soft Sally
customer_reviews.text: We wanted Jack and Sally for our Christmas tree this year! Sally is soft and beautiful and she looks perfectly happy with Jack Skellington by her side.
customer_reviews.author: Bright Owl

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The color of the product is way off. The quality of the product is not good at all. I already notice stitches is breaking in different parts. If I could return this item with would. Apparently my son like playing with it
customer_reviews.author: Yong Li

customer_reviews.title: Hulk
customer_reviews.text: I told my grandson that Santa delivered this to the wrong house. We were on a video chat and he looked and said is that your grandma? And I said no I said I don’t know who this is? I didn’t know who it was but I don’t want him to know that. So I told him he had to come to grandmas house to get his Christmas package that went the wrong house. The hulk Is very full, fluffy and soft. I know my seven-year-old grandson will love him.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie.

customer_reviews.title: HECKIN’ BIG
customer_reviews.text: Yo Hei Hei has been hitting the gym and is on a growth supplement of some kind because he’s huge. Like 3/4 of my toddler sized huge. We didn’t pay close attention when ordering, we just heard not to order the squeaky Hei Hei!! Thank god it does not squeak, just an intimidating size. Feels like it might actually start walking across the room. Might be bigger than an actual chicken. 4/5 stars for the bird.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan O’Connor

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect exceeded expectatiobs. He's HUGE !!! My daughter is going as Moana for Halloween and she mommy I need the piggy. So I went on and for the price I thought he'd be this little toy. I was pleased to see not only how big he is but what amazing quality he is as well. My daughter loves him!
customer_reviews.author: AO1524

customer_reviews.title: Jack is perfect
customer_reviews.text: We wanted Jack and Sally under our Christmas tree this year. These two look perfectly happy together and both are made nicely and very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Bright Owl

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT quality, looks and feels amazing! I bought it as a gift for my daughters friend but now both my daughters want one too! It is huge compared to a lot of the ones I was searching for and it has the best face from similar ones I found. The price is way better than the ones I found in the stores (Including shipping it is still slightly cheaper).
customer_reviews.author: Keri Foster

customer_reviews.title: He loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My best little 5yo buddy had a birthday party last weekend, and I wasn't sure what to get him. He had just taught me how to play minecraft with him the week before, and when his mom told me that they were decorating his bedroom with a minecraft theme, I knew that this Creeper pillow would be PERFECT!!! That little sly guy snuck into the present pile and was running around the party hugging his creeper almost immediately!! A huge hit! <3 Also, fast shipping, and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: ~JeskaJoy~

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for a young boy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this plush car for my 1 year old son who LOVES cars! He loves it because he can carry it around the house and actually lay in it as a pillow and snuggle with it unlike your typical toy car. It’s about half the size of him and the fabric is soft, but still has all the lightening McQueen detailing on it! Great purchase! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Lisa Marino

customer_reviews.title: This plush is awesome
customer_reviews.text: We just redecorated my son's room in marvel comics, and this was the perfect addition to his decore... we loved this plush so much we had to order spiderman, captain America, iron man, and Thor to complete the collection. They look amazing on his bed.I highly recommend this product. It arrived on before expected and we couldn't be happier with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Hulk Doll a Big Hit!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stuffed doll for one of my grandsos who LOVES The Hulk. When he opened the box he couldn't have been more happy, hugging and talking to it as though it were real. He crried it everywhere with him that day. Well made, huggable size for a 5 year old, this item gets an A+++ rating from me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It was a Christmas HIT
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson is a Spiderman FREAK! Wears the costume every day and his parents had to buy him spidey pajamas or he wouldn't go to bed. This was the BEST present ever, he loved it and wouldn't put it down the entire evening. It is SO SOFT and cuddly, even I wanted to hold it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Dilbeck

customer_reviews.title: Wrong one sent
customer_reviews.text: The product overall is a good size and very comfy, however I received the Minecraft Alex Plush instead of the Steve character. I'm assuming they were out of stock in the Steve Plush, but they should not have just sent another character in it's place. If I received the correct one, I would have given it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and soft enough to sleep with.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson saw this online and giggled out loud when his Mimma asked if he’d like it for his 4th birthday. He is “bad guys” obsessed! He calls them all bad guys both super hero’s and villains. I think it’s wonderful but it will get the true test next Saturday once the birthday boy gets it. My only wish is that his legs were adjustable to stand as well as sit... that does seem to be important to the 3 almost 4 year old. Hulk is bigger than I expected so I think he might be a new sleeping buddy.
customer_reviews.author: The Happy MeMe

customer_reviews.title: The cuteness factor is off the charts! My 2yr old is in love with his new friend.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves Spiderman. This was an impulse buy. I saw this on a free overnight shipping deal and was desperate to get presents for his birthday before bad weather hit. I was so pleasently surprised, at the size, and quality for the price. Spiderman is almost as big as my 36" toddler, it's the perfect size for him to carry around. The cuteness factor is off the charts. I was worried when the other characters were listed by name and spiderman was listed as "blue pillow buddy", but it worked out and my son is very pleased with his new friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not cotton all the way through
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this the Thomas stuffed toy for a 2-year-old. I chose this version over a less expensive version sold at Target because if a review that said it was stuffed with cotton. The Target version is more like a bean bag. However, only the top of this version is stuffed with cotton. The main body is stuffed with “beans.” Potentially a choking hazard for younger children should they spill out. Otherwise, the toy looks okay. The colors are not as vibrant as I hoped, but it’s a decent likeness of Thomas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for all age!
customer_reviews.text: In the product description states, all ages but on the hangtag states 3+ my child is younger than three so this is a problem. Secondly, the comb and tail feather is made from felt so this plush is not washable. The instruction state spot clean. So this is why the three-stars other than that great size, fun color to bad it does work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ITS SO LARGE
customer_reviews.text: This pillow/plush toy is gigantic compared to my two-year-old son! We were really looking for a plush toy of lightning McQueen that he could carry around with him but this is much too large for that however it is a great product, was put together very well and the colors are very vibrant. We were really looking after a plush toy of lightning McQueen that he could carry around with him but this is much too large for that however it has a great product, was put together very well and the colors are very vibrant
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bird

customer_reviews.title: For the Minecraft fan
customer_reviews.text: This plush is rather larger than I thought he would be! Arrived quickly. My son LOVES Minecraft and was super excited to receive this pillow buddy. Every Minecraft fan will enjoy :)
customer_reviews.author: countreesally

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old, and it lasted less than a month before it got a hole in it. Also, pieces of the black hair on top come off all the time and I find small black clumps all over my house. Not worth it unless you're putting on a shelf up high for decor. Otherwise, it won't stand a chance with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Let's skadaddle

customer_reviews.title: Great stuffie!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves stuffed animals and Moana, so this was a great gift for him! Pua is almost the same size as him, so it's pretty funny seeing him playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Grace

customer_reviews.title: Very Surprised for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandsons but they fight over it so this is my second purchase to keep peace in the house. It is larger than I expected and very durable. Saw a smaller one in a local store and it was pretty expensive...this one is great quality and detail.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Claxton

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Pillow Doll
customer_reviews.text: The description fits it well. It is a pillow sized spiderman doll. It is a nice doll but is a couple of notches above carnival doll quality and not Disney doll quality. To me its cool but looks kinda cheap to me, I think its because it is a pillow type doll. If you look at the pictures it resembles the pictures exactly. It is still a great value and our kid loves to snuggle with it.
customer_reviews.author: Notarobot

customer_reviews.title: Great size and very comfortable snuggle buddy
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter’s favorite snuggle buddy. I actually bought one from Target a couple years ago and she loved it so much, she can’t sleep without it. I had to get another one as it wore out but couldn’t find it anywhere. I was so lucky to see it on Amazon and at a great price. It’s the perfect size for little ones to cuddle with and both soft and firm enough to sleep comfortably on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old JOY!!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a smaller pig, but it's a great value for the price!! My daughter loves her Pua!! She takes him everywhere!! Had to take him to gymnastics, he has in ownnchair at the table, and has tea parties with her. Had to convince her he was a real pig so he could not go swimming... so he sat in her chair and "stood guard" while she was swimming... and "he is real mommy in his own way" shes 3 and I would never put a price on her happiness!!! Have little ones who love Moana def get them one!!🥰🥰🥰🤗
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Son is obsessed
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with cars and he went crazy for this pillow when we moved him to his big boy bed. He use to fall asleep with actual toy cars so this makes it easier to leave the toys in the bin for bed. Great quality and a lot bigger than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy this again!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for his 3rd birthday and he loved it. It's a great size and very well made. He actually likes to take him for naps with him
customer_reviews.author: Casi

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's the luck of the draw if you get a big or small one... we received a small one. By some of the pictures posted, we expected ours to be the same size. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki D.

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft pillow plushies great gift for kids who love Minecraft
customer_reviews.text: I had bought the Creeper version of these oversized plushies for my youngest son for Christmas. My older son liked it too and requested that I get him Alex for his birthday. The kids really enjoy sleeping with them. They are soft and very pillow like. The characters also look great with my son's Minecraft themed bedding. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Raven

customer_reviews.title: 😭😱😤
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this couple months ago for my grandson he loves it to death he plays with it all day long but it’s starting to rip he’s really sad about that so now he won’t play with it because he’s afraid it will fall apart
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Ann Guardado

customer_reviews.title: A great Mickey Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I had to get rid of 2 other Mickeys that I’d got my toddler because they had PU foam (or whatever it’s called) which is toxic. Found this one and it’s 100% polyester fiber stuffing which is great, but it’s so soft and sturdy and it’s even made it through the washer and dryer and came out perfectly fine!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Plush and snuggly, great nap buddy!
customer_reviews.text: This plush Hulk was bigger than I thought it would be, which was a happy surprise! It is soft and will definitely be a good nap buddy for my little guy! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hardin

customer_reviews.title: a little awkward but my son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: this "pillow" is great! My 2 year old son carries it around all the time. he loves Hulk so this was a perfect gift. The only thing about it i don't like is that it is made so that he sits, therefore the legs stick out, and don't just dangle down. it can make it awkward to lay with or carry around. you almost have to carry it like a baby on your hip.
customer_reviews.author: Emily R

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the stuffed Spiderman for my 4 yr-old grandson's birthday party to use as a prop on the gift table. The kids couldn't keep their hands off of it! The quality was a lot better than I imagined, especially for the price. I will definitely order another one for any little boy who loves Spiderman!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Viands

customer_reviews.title: A big soft mean Hulk Pillow
customer_reviews.text: This soft Big Mean Green Hulk pillow was ordered for our Grandson. He is a Big Avengers Fan. I know He will like this. The only problem I had was the box was not taped all the way up. It was half way open. My husband and I was amazed that the product didn’t fall out. Also, The Hulk Pillow was Half wrapped up in plastic. There was also no receipt in the box.
customer_reviews.author: jenny fenton

customer_reviews.title: Kid-Sized Spiderman
customer_reviews.text: This guy is really big! He is very soft and makes the perfect playmate or sleeping buddy. At the time I purchased, the price was quite reasonable. I was very surprised at the size for the price. Too bad his friends in the same make/brand are so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this. Only giving 4 stars as it remains in a sitting position, so he’s kind of hard to lay next to and snuggle up with when his legs are always straight up. However he is still comfy and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest most adorable stuffed animal that I may have ever purchased in my entire life. We bought this for our 2 year old grandchild and now I’m thinking about purchasing one for all of our grandchildren. I’m beyond impressed with the quality and such a great size.
customer_reviews.author: The Seven Prides

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than description states
customer_reviews.text: I order this with the assumption that because of the measurement that was stated that it would be the same size as my daughters favorite Mickey. I bought for a backup Mickey and when i received it the Mickey is HUUUUGE.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrie Reitz

customer_reviews.title: She loved it
customer_reviews.text: Authentic classic Mickey! For 2 yr old granddaughter. She opened up the package, saw Mickey, her eyes danced! She gave him a very long hug. I’d say this one is a winner for a toddler Disney fan.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.text: My niece LOOOOOVED her Darth Vader. She's 4 and thinks he's the coolest and evil lol so he was tooting on Grandma 🤣 best present ever.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Good

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter (3 years old) was so excited and my daughter (her mom) was very pleased. It was bigger than we thought it would be but it is soft and colorful and perfect for my granddaughter. She thought it was fantastic and just what she wanted. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ok for decoration - not really as a pillow or a toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Thomas so of course he was excited about getting this as a gift. However, it definitely wouldn't be considered a "pillow" in my book. It's quite firm and would not be comfy for laying on. It's also not great for holding to cuddle. Right now it just sits on my son's bed as a decoration. This is fine with me, but it doesn't get much use other than just being there. All in all, it's not a bad purchase if you're looking for a stuffed version of Thomas - just be prepared that it might become a decor item rather than a toy that actually gets used.
customer_reviews.author: Harmorob

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The sally doll is better then I expected and is perfect! Great size for the price, love it so much. Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cute Pua
customer_reviews.text: My daugher loved Pua. It was on her Moana themed birthday table as decor. Then it became a present. Only complaints were that the nose was dirty on arrival and it was head heavy. So it doesn't stand the best, a 2 year old doesn't care though. Good quality, and made the table pop.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Keck

customer_reviews.title: Sleep friend
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old grandson is obsessed with the Hulk and now can sleep with this soft pillow. And he kindly lets his 2 year old sister use at her nap time!
customer_reviews.author: FancyNancy

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: The product information is EXTREMELY misleading. In the description, it says 15" tall, but product information states 22".... HUGE difference. I purchased my 3 toddlers all new pillow buddies, and now my child is highly upset due to the smaller size than his brothers. Thanks seller.... WOULD NOT RECOMMEND for the price!!!! I could have found the same item half the price if the description was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystina Shoop

customer_reviews.title: Huge Thomas Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking this was going to be smaller more like a stuffed animal than a pillow. I dont imagine it would be very comfortable for a 2 year old to use as a pillow either because of its shape. Though hes a big thomas fan so he loves it and doesnt care about comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: If you're a Thomas fanatic
customer_reviews.text: Gave this stuffed toy to our grandson (not quite 2 years old) and he LOVES it. Sleeps with it every night along with his menagerie if other friends. He likes to carry it around cuz it's soft and squishable too. Well made too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Halloween is canceled this year in our community due to Covid. I still wanted to make it special for my child so I am creating a BOO basket. Jack will be a perfect addition to his basket just don't know how he will fit inside. lol. I'm happy with my order & i'm sure my son will be as well!!
customer_reviews.author: A_Michael

customer_reviews.title: Quite large, super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my three year old nephew. He absolutely loved it. In fact, 6 months later, he still sleeps with it and brings it out to play with. One of his favorite things. It's much bigger than I anticipated, which made it even better. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tarv

customer_reviews.title: Great, Soft Toy
customer_reviews.text: We got this and the Steve toy at the same time. This toy was much bigger and very cute. Our six year old now sleeps with it every night, so the Alex stuffed toy is a win! It's large, bigger than a stuffed teddy bear, and soft enough for him to sleep with it and on it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the item is amazing. I opened the box and was so amazed it’s HUGE. Great for a sleeping buddy. I cannot wait to give this too my son. My 3 year old seen it. And I had to buy her one as well lol
customer_reviews.author: Kera Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I liked the character and features of it. Its the size and feel i expected. Like the toys you win at a carnival. Lol. My brother just had heart surgery. The hospital gave him a plush heart shaped pillow to hold against his chest when coughing or standing and sitting. His favorite marvel character is Hulk so i gave him this Hulk pillow to hold on to. He loved it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Stitch problem on left arm
customer_reviews.text: When I got the Sally doll I took a look at her and I'm kind of disappointed with the design on her left arm on her left arm on the outside it's plain the stitches on the inside instead of the outside like on the right arm I think they should have made the design the same on each arm but otherwise the doll is really cute I like Jack and Sally I have both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Spider man's sides are bursting....and not from laughter.
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, but I seems disproportional. The main issue is after our son sleeping with it. On his bed and him holding it, it is falling apart. You would think he pulled and roughed this thing up. Nope. He's 3 yrs old loves spider man and this thing has its own pillow next to him. He holds it and it gives me a hug when I tuck both of them in. It's a crazy routine but we do it. The new routine now includes restuffing part of Spiderman's abdomen....or is it thorax.....seriously though the stitching is horrible. I don't know if it was the fabric that made it worse. But you could see weak points when we unboxed it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Piotrowski

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was sent a used pig with food stuck in his hair and hair falling out. Replacement is on the way... I will say this pig is MUCH larger than expected and very soft/cuddly. I'll update this later..
customer_reviews.author: Chezby

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s huge lol but cute. The tail is like a weird, stiff felt like material. I saw some reviews complaining about it but honestly it’s still worth the money in my opinion, especially if your kids love Moana (and HeiHei). My daughter is about to be 11months and she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great gift & soft!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's 3rd birthday and he loves it. It has become his favorite bedtime companion. Really happy with the product and would have given it 5 stars but found a slight rip on the seam behind the neck a few hours after gifting it which was quickly fixed. Its been almost a month now and there have been no other issues. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It was way better quality than I thought it would be. It is very soft material and firm so it will actually stand. My 3 year old daught is obsessed with pigs and thanks to the little guy from Moana she calls all of them including the ones from peppa pig Pus.
customer_reviews.author: geoffroi

customer_reviews.title: Every Thomas fan needs this soft adorable toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. He is in love with thomas and this is perfect for him. He is 21 months old so this is a nice size for him. It's a little bigger than an average teddy bear but still something he can hold in his arms. Really soft! He sleeps with it every night in his crib.
customer_reviews.author: Jrc85

customer_reviews.title: Soft and nice size
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for a 5 year old who loves minecraft. I think he will love it. It's so soft. The plush is bigger than I thought it was going to be, however I didnt look at the size before ordering. Great price for this and im satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Hulk stuffed toy
customer_reviews.text: I would of given it a 5 star but the seams came apart the first time he played with it, I fixed it and it's been fine since. He now uses it as a pillow and a wrestling toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pua was very cute and way bigger then expected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little sister and she absolutely loved it. I have to say it was way bigger then expected!! Super duper soft and very cute! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah Navares

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft!
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for my son eid gift and he loves it! He was always stealing my Batman cuddle buddy so I got him his own. This helps him sleep in his bed because he loves to cuddle but I need my bed to myself sometimes lol great product
customer_reviews.author: Amirah Pettus

customer_reviews.title: Now, if
customer_reviews.text: I can just get my two year old to STOP running around punching everything and everyone while yelling, "Hulk SMASH!" I'll be ok. (-_-)
customer_reviews.author: TraeEx

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and well made toy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute toy and my grandson really likes it. He gets very involved in long battles with it, given they are for the time being about the same size. It’s hysterical to see and despite Hulk losing innumerable battles he looks no worse the wear.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth Be Told......

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Spiderman Ultimate 26" pillow time Pal, for my 2 year grandson for Christmas and I know he is going to love it. The colors and size are perfect. I also purchased the matching PJ, that are wonderful too. I can't wait to give him this gift. The price was amazing too. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Nice

customer_reviews.title: Soft, good quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: So cute and soft, great size (not small at all) great price. I have even been able to clean the surface of it easily. My kiddo loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Shandi Rine

customer_reviews.title: GrandDAUGHTER’s Birthday
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids are big Thomas fans. Trains are not just for boys, my granddaughter loves cats,truck and trains too. I got this for my granddaughter’s birthday and paired it with the Thomas the Train 5 minute bedtime story book. She is going to love both.. the pillow is big and snuggly- and big enough go to pretend to ride :)
customer_reviews.author: D. S. ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: Great plush at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase! I bought for a birthday gift for my 2 year old who is obsessed with Spider-Man! This has to be one of the best push toys I’ve seen for this price , and the fact that it is spiderman ( nothing marvel is priced this well!) I have seen in other reviews saying that it tends to tear easily, (mine so far is in great condition and was received with no tears.) For the price, I don’t mind one bit to stitch it up myself if a small hole occurs. I am happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: The Fam Jams

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with what to buy for my 10-year-old grandson. He is totally obsessed with minecraft...and spends a lot of time traveling with his parents. He loved this pillow...it is perfect for the car, his bed, or watching TV. I also think he can use it as a headrest for sleeping on plane flights!! It was a win!!
customer_reviews.author: EWM

customer_reviews.title: So so cute!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! If you've seen the movie it's the cutest thing. I know my great grandson is going to love it. He's only 21 months old and is obsessed with Moana. I'll try and review again after Christmas if I can make it through Thanksgiving without giving it to him LOL.
customer_reviews.author: luvharley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pillow!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very cuddly and good quality. It’s going to make a 5 yr. old boy very happy for his birthday. The shipping was so quick and the pillow is adorable...
customer_reviews.author: DONNA S.

customer_reviews.title: Tougher than Steve
customer_reviews.text: This Stuffed pillow buddy Alex is so loved by my 5 yr old grandson. I was originally going to buy him Steve but was informed that Alex is a much better fighter ( "she never dies and is tougher than Steve" ) I asked why she was stronger and tougher than Steve? he said idk I think cuz she's a girl and they are better at protecting and defending. Alex was worth every penny. Perspective... Priceless!
customer_reviews.author: Leecia D

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness its bigger than I thought comes up to my 2 year old grandson chin. He loves it. It wont put it down. He walked away without it and about panicked and went to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma2014

customer_reviews.title: Great Doll, could be sturdier
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece, who absolutely loves it. However, the neck no longer holds up the head and the head just falls. We were able to sew the neck to make it a bit more sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, but grandkids love Thomas!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love Thomas and this is the 2nd one I have bought. I believe they are super over priced. In the past, I have had to make repairs. I just gave this Thomas to my youngest grandson (2 yrs old) and so far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Singalongcella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match
customer_reviews.text: I got this Sally to go along with my son’s Jack plush that we got 2 years ago. It was a perfect match! My son absolutely loves it! Highly recommend this Sally plush doll.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Pulling double duty...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this Christmas gift...literally he cares Steve everywhere!!!! The pillow is made of great material, and he has all the right stuff-ing, not too firm not too wimpy...just right!! He stands on his own and is brightly colored. Fun to play with until too tired to play but Steve has your back, well your sleepy head, perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jones

customer_reviews.title: Durable ,fun and the right size.
customer_reviews.text: This is a favorite toy. This will be a backup. It is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: oldfastpat

customer_reviews.title: Cute plush Mickey that is nice and large
customer_reviews.text: Cute Mickey Mouse plush that is nice and large. Less expensive than in Disney world for sure. Our toddler loves it. Perfect size for him to hug.
customer_reviews.author: Lfc 19

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew who loves Star Wars. Darth Vader is his favorite character. This product was a decent price and the product is larger than I realized. I can't wait to give it to my nephew. He's going to love it. Quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Frost

customer_reviews.title: I know my grandson will love this!
customer_reviews.text: Great plush animal! Bought this for a Christmas present for my 2 1/2 yr old grandson. The ONLY reason I gave 4 stars (or should be 4.9 stars) is when this arrived the feathers got bent in the packing/shipping. My daughter will need to try and steam them down. It’s really a minor issue but I thought I would mention it so maybe when u ship it, maybe tie or bind the feathers to something so they stay down. I know, I’m kind of OCD but just thought I would mention it for the sellers sake, like a FYI. Would buy from this seller again, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: VERY FUN AND GIFTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Review written by 8 year old who was given the gift: I love it! and its been 3 months since i got it and no tear! this is cool for anyone who's a fan of spider man, he was bigger then i expected! i started playing right out of the box my sister was making food and me and spidy were playing spys! an then we watched TV together in my fort :) how about give it to the person who made spider man itself? well that's all i have to say now! this was the written review by the 8 year old who got this toy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 yo
customer_reviews.text: My son became obsessed with Spider-Man. He was also having issue sleeping in his bed. I got him this do Spider-Man could protect him. It worked for a while. It’s pretty bid to play with. Definitely more of a sleeping buddy/pillow thing.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper5

customer_reviews.title: Awesome doll.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. My niece loves it tremendously. Thank you for making this product. Very satisfied customer here.
customer_reviews.author: RLL

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing !!When it arrived it totally exceeded our expectations. I hugged it eventho it was meant to be gifted. It's cuddly and perfect for anyone really. As a cuddle buddy, travel companion, or just for play time or bed pillow. It's so versatile, it can be cuddled and played with. Love it! All pros no cons. And delivery was faster than expected, packaging was neat.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: great product!!
customer_reviews.text: We just got back from our 5 year old's birthday party...he loves the Hulk!! This was a hit with him! Highly recommend!! Very fast service also!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy For a Toddler Who Loves Spiderman
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect for my toddler grandson! He loves Spiderman and this plush toy is so much fun! It's almost as tall as he is and he loves to take him everywhere. Well made, too.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Range

customer_reviews.title: A good gift for a Spiderman fanatic
customer_reviews.text: My grandson wanted this for his girlfriend. She was ecstatic over it. For me it was just a stuffed toy. For my grandson, it was the perfect gift for his girlfriend. So, based on that parameter, it was definitely 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Burton W.

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy but
customer_reviews.text: The toy was very cute however it arrived with a tear in the top of the head. I would have returned it but my daughter said she could repair it. My grand daughter loved the toy and I would have given it five stars if not for the damage. If you are thinking of buying it just beware it could arrive damaged but it may arrive just fine my experience may be just an isolated incident. Quality control aside, your child will love it.
customer_reviews.author: R Ply

customer_reviews.title: Tail and head piece seem almost like cardboard but the rest is really plush
customer_reviews.text: The bird looks like the one in the movie. Not sure how the tail will hold up with a toddler pulling on it. The body is soft and cuddly with great coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Casteel

product_meta.title: Jay Franco Avengers Plush Stuffed Hulk Pillow Buddy - Super Soft Polyester Microfiber, 23 inch (Official Marvel Product)
product_meta.description: Marvel's Avengers "Hulk" pillow time pal. Soft and cuddly sleeping pillow. Pillow time pal features character from the popular Comic Hulk who also appears in Avengers infinity war. Pillow time pal can be used as a sleeping buddy and is made from soft pillow-like materials.
feature_bullets: SUPER SOFT & GREAT SUPPORT - Pillow buddy measures 23 inches. Made of 100% polyester microfiber, the Hulk Pillow Buddy provides great support for any child. This plush stuffed pillow is comfortable to cuddle with whether in the car, school, or in your home.

LONG LASTING & FUN SIZE - With every hug, your little one is sure to be smiling. This well made durable pillow buddy will last many washes. Easy care spot clean only. Your child will never leave their Hulk pillow buddy behind!

GREAT FOR ALL AGES - Your child will quickly accept this Hulk Pillow as a member of the family and earn a spot in the bed. Great for playtime, naptime, or bedtime this will make the perfect gift for your loved one. This Pillow buddy is Collectable Approved!

SHOP THE HULK COLLECTION - Collect this one of a kind plush stuffed toy and complete your ultimate Hulk collection. Enhance your child’s bed and bath experience with our other Marvel Hulk products. Coordinating bedding and accessories available (sold separately).

DREAM BIGGER- Innovation, Imagination, and Inspiration are the roots of our family company. Our company is still small and family run. We take great pride in our products and our unsurpassed customer service. We know that our wonderful customers are the reason we are in business! We offer excellent quality, non-toxic products. With our coordinating accessories, you can mix and match our high-quality and unique boys and girls bed, bath, and beach products.
